alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 1:25AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 5000 feet, total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches expected. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 4000 feet, total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
